name: tron-ultimate-ai-platform
description: Pure class AI agent platform with Tron aesthetics

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../frontend && npm install

author: TRON AI Team
